data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Motyka, Michal, Bocak, Ladislav (2018): Escalonius, a new subgenus of Calochromus Guérin-Méneville, 1833 identified by the molecular phylogeny of Calochromini (Coleoptera: Lycidae). Zootaxa 4461 (1): 77-82, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4461.1.5|1 occurrence
